DataElement.preferredName: Patient Adjuvant Clinical Trial Registration Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for information related to a patient registration to an adjuvant clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to a patient registration to an adjuvant clinical trial.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: An agent that enhances the activity or therapeutic effect of another pharmacologic substance without having much, if any, therapeutic impact by itself.:A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.:The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.

Concepts.definition: An agent that enhances the activity or therapeutic effect of another pharmacologic substance without having much, if any, therapeutic impact by itself.
A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the identification of cancer research protocols.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
